name: Basic Wizard Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.
description:
You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the wizard archetype, add two common spells of that level to your spellbook.Basic Wizard Spellcasting Leads To...

Arcane Breadth, Expert Wizard SpellcastingTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
